title: How Jane Fonda, 88, would REALLY look if she never had any cosmetic enhancements
description: Artificial intelligence was instructed to analyze photos of the former model when she was younger and predict what her appearance would be at age 88 had she kept everything natural.
content:
AI photos have imagined what Jane Fonda would look like if she had not had any cosmetic enhancements.
The actress, who turned 88 years old on Sunday, has been open about the plastic surgery and beauty procedures she's gotten over the years.

title: Scientists who use AI tools are publishing more papers than ever before
description: Science is entering a massive publishing boom, in large part due to artificial intelligence. New research published in the journal Science has revealed that scientists who use large language models (LLMs) like ChatGPT are producing significantly more papers across many fields. The technology is also helping to level the playing field for researchers whose first language isn't English.

title: The Stock Market’s Wild 2025 Roller-Coaster Ride in Six Charts
description: This was a year of extremes for the US stock market. The S&P 500 Index plunged to the verge of a tariff-induced bear market in April, only to quickly rebound after President Trump relented and by late June was hitting repeated records fueled by enthusiasm for all things artificial intelligence.

title: Colorado lawmakers undeterred despite Trump order on state AI laws
description: President Donald Trump's executive order on artificial intelligence threatened Colorado over its AI regulations, but lawmakers and Attorney General Phil Weiser said they aren't deterred.

title: The signs that Amazon is losing its grip on Christmas
description: Online shoppers are turning to artificial intelligence bots to find the cheapest deals
content:
If you still need to do some eleventh-hour Christmas shopping, one place above all others is likely to spring to mind.
